rows.label: tev010301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Wilbur about the conditions in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Wilbur if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Wilbur about the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Wilbur about the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Well, unidentified xenos shot down the White Whale,
and now there's just one thin wall separating New
LA's residents from a planet full of violent indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0003
rows.name:
I think the people of New LA are generally upbeat
by nature, but they're harboring some deep anxieties.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0004
rows.name:
I've heard that a lot of them are receiving counseling
for various psychological issues.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0005
rows.name:
I suppose the bourgeois has always lacked the
resiliency of the upper class.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0006
rows.name:
Whereas I, even here, was able to build a successful
company with a beautiful and intelligent secretary.
I also have a manor. With a pool. A large one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0007
rows.name:
It doesn't matter where you are—humanity will always
divide itself into winners and losers. That's the only
distinction that matters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0010
rows.name:
A series of trading cards called Miralife Cards
were released recently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0011
rows.name:
My beautiful secretary, Pepper, has become strangely
obsessed with collecting them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0012
rows.name:
I purchased a pack to see what the fuss was about,
but they're just cards with crude drawings of indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0013
rows.name:
I completely fail to understand the appeal. But my dear
Pepper, at least, seems excited to learn about the local
wildlife here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0014
rows.name:
If that girl is good at one thing, it's identifying trends.
I wonder what the next one will be?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0022
rows.name:
How much longer must I endure that giant ship?
I didn't have my manor built on the finest real estate
in the city just to have its view completely obstructed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0023
rows.name:
Whenever I call BLADE command to complain,
they just blather on about some friendship treaty
and say they can't force the ship to move.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0024
rows.name:
Bosh and blimshaw, I say! Oh, I'd like to do business
with them if I could, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0025
rows.name:
Well, I don't know that I can overlook this slight.
Even all of my obscene wealth isn't enough to get
that blasted ship out of the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0041
rows.name:
I hear you've finally ascertained the location of the
Lifehold Core![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0042
rows.name:
What a joy it is to finally see a return on the massive
financial investment I've made in this BLADE
organization of yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0043
rows.name:
However, there is still something that troubles me.
Once the Lifehold Core is secure, will I be forced out
of this mimeosome and back into my real body?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0044
rows.name:
Because I have no desire to part with a body that has
granted me eternal youth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0045
rows.name:
We should be given a choice between retaining our
mimeosomes and returning to flesh-and-blood bodies.
...Or at the very least, the rich should have the choice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0050
rows.name:
How much longer must I endure that giant ship?
I didn't have my manor built on the finest real estate
in the city just to have its view completely obstructed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0051
rows.name:
Whenever I call BLADE command to complain,
they just blather on about some friendship treaty
and say they can't force the ship to move.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0052
rows.name:
I'll grant that the Ma-non are important allies that we
BLADEs have a duty to protect, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0053
rows.name:
Well, I don't know that I can overlook this slight.
Even all of my obscene wealth isn't enough to get
that blasted ship out of the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0057
rows.name:
Ah! A pleasure to see you again, my friend!
Thanks to that item you procured for me,
I have successfully enlisted in BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0058
rows.name:
I've also ceded control of my company over to my
beautiful secretary, Pepper, so now there is nothing
holding me back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0059
rows.name:
I'm free to traipse about Mira as I will, capturing
each and every one of the indigens depicted on
those Miralife Cards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0060
rows.name:
It's all thanks to you that I am able to take this next
step in my personal evolution. You have my deepest
appreciations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0068
rows.name:
I hear we've finally ascertained the location of the
Lifehold Core![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0069
rows.name:
It has been a long and grueling war, but soon we
BLADEs will have our hard-fought victory![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0070
rows.name:
However, there is still something that troubles me.
Once the Lifehold Core is secure, will I be forced out
of this mimeosome and back into my real body?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0071
rows.name:
Because if I'm to continue doing battle with indigens,
I'd have much more success with this body than some
withered, flesh-and-blood version.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0072
rows.name:
If possible, I would prefer we be given a choice
between retaining our mimeosomes and returning
to our previous bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0073
rows.name: I hear the Lifehold Core has been secured.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0074
rows.name:
I haven't been ordered to leave my mimeosome for
my real body yet, and I'm hoping I'll never have to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0075
rows.name:
A mimeosome never gets sick, its wounds can be
fixed with replacement parts, and—above all—it offers
freedom from the ravages of old age.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_MSG0076
rows.name:
If possible, I would prefer we be given a choice
between retaining our mimeosomes and returning
to our previous bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010301_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Wilbur how he's been lately.
